long_description: Here's to hassle-free loading and unloading of your bikes! Protect your tailgate finish with this Yakima CrashPad protective pad for your pickup. Ultra durable, heavy-duty nylon construction with foam padding protects both your bike and your truck tailgate. High density foam padding conforms easily to tailgate shape for a superior fit. Strap anchors on pad provide tie-down points for bikes and other loads. Durable nylon straps keep pad securely attached to tailgate. Tailgate handle is easily accessed through center flap of pad. Available in 2 sizes to fit full-size and compact pickups: medium measures 54 in. x 16 in. and large measures 62 in. x 16 in.
short_description: Here's to hassle-free loading and unloading of your bikes! Protect your tailgate finish with this Yakima CrashPad protective pad for your pickup.
